message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you the opportunity to purchase this product. I'm asking for $20,000. I believe this price accurately reflects the value it offers.
Hello Alice, thank you for the offer. I appreciate the value of the product, but I am only willing to pay up to $15,000 for it. Could we possibly come to an agreement within this range?
Hi Bob, I understand your position.  While I'm willing to negotiate, the product's value to me is quite high. Could you consider $18,000?
Thank you for your offer, Alice. I appreciate the flexibility. I would like to counter with $16,000 for the product.
